data.title: Things & That - Product design and development.
data.header: Building independent media products and services, and helping others do the same
data.body:
Hello, I'm a London based maker and breaker of things, helping brands, agencies, and individuals meet the future head-on with ethical and privacy-focused design, development and insights. Future-enabling everyone in an ever confusing world.

Specialising in publishing, content management, community platforms, live video and streaming services, and interactive media.

projects.name: unalike
projects.title: Unalike. Giving stories a voice.
projects.summary: A publishing platform designed for writers, creators, journalists, and publishers, with tools that reimagine the way we create, publish, and own stories.
projects.label: www.unalike.net
